name: Happy Copter: 3D
description:
Move your happycopter to the sides and fill the empty blocks. Don not get caught by the enemies. Try to fill all the level and pass to the next one. Collect coins as much as you can at the bonus levels.

Features :
- Free to play. Play it anywhere in anytime.
- Outstanding graphics.
- Fun Gameplay.
- Easy to play hard to master.
